author: Kometa-Team
install_msg: You have just installed the 'magic8ball' cog. Have fun! Activate with `!magic8ball <question>`
name: magic8ball
short: This cog will react to `!magic8ball` within your server and share a random magic8ball answer as an embed back to the user
description: This cog will react to `!magic8ball` within your server and share a random magic8ball answer as an embed back to the user
